name: Soul In The Castle
description: Protect your castle from the goblins ! You'll play as a soul that can't defend its castle, only by activating traps and bombs, which will kill those goblins ! This game has been made during a game jam handled by the awesome french youtuber TUTO UNITY FR or his second channel ZEF LAB. This game is a 2D game type, with infinite waves to complete. Enjoy ;)
